titles.title: Virgin Islands National Park Land Exchange Act of 2005
Virgin Islands National Park Land Exchange Act of 2005

To provide for a land exchange on the island of Saint John, Virgin Islands, between the National Park Service and the Government of the United States Virgin Islands to facilitate the establishment of a school on the island, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Virgin Islands National Park Land Exchange Act of 2005 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to exchange certain Virgin Islands National Park land on the island of Saint John, U.S. Virgin Islands, with the Government of the U.S. Virgin Islands for the purpose of establishing a school on such island.
